Election Info
=============

**MAY 3, 2025 ELECTION: CANDIDATE REPORTS>** [**See document**](https://myportisabel.com/DocumentCenter/View/863)**.**

**NOTICE OF MUNICIPAL ELECTION (AVISO DE ELECCION MUNICIPAL) To the Registered Voters of Port Isabel, Texas>**[**See document**](https://myportisabel.com/DocumentCenter/View/860)**.**  
**2025 ELECTION: APPLICATIONS SUBMITTED FOR A PLACE ON THE BALLOT>**[**See document**](https://myportisabel.com/DocumentCenter/View/859)**.**

**\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_**

**NOTICE OF DEADLINE TO FILE AN APPLICATION FOR PLACE ON THE BALLOT**  
**CITIES, SCHOOL DISTRICTS AND OTHER POLITICAL SUBDIVISION**

***AVISO DE FECHA LIMITE PARA PRESENTAR UNA SOLICITUD PARA UN LUGAR EN LA***  
***BOLETA PARA CIUDADES, DISTRITOS ESCOLARES Y OTRAS SUBDIVISIONES POLITICAS***

[See full document](https://myportisabel.com/DocumentCenter/View/847).  
Filing Dates and Times:  
*(Fechas y Horario para Entregar Solicitudes:)*  
Start Date: 1/15/2025  
End Date: 2/14/2025  
Office Hours: 8 a.m. - 5 p.m., Monday - Friday

[![internet-posting-requirement-for-political-subdivisions Opens in new window](https://myportisabel.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=848)](https://myportisabel.com/DocumentCenter/View/849/INTERNET-POSTING-REQUIREMENT-1-year)
